GR14brhms5cu:11: vicāre tu mamātra syād ṛṣīṇāṃ sa ṛṣir gatiḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:12: yadyapy adhyāya-śata-yuk saṃhitā sā tathāpy asau |
GR14brhms5cu:15: tad evātra parāmṛṣṭaṃ tato hṛṣṭaṃ mano mama ||
GR14brhms5cu:17: atra tat punar āmṛśya vyākhyātuṃ spṛśyate mayā ||
GR14brhms5cu:18: atha śrīmad-bhāgavate yad uktaṃ ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān
GR14brhms5cu:19: svayam [BhP 1.3.28] iti tad eva prathamam āha īśvara iti | atra kṛṣṇa ity eva
GR14brhms5cu:23: tan-nāma-vargāvirbhāva-kṛtā gargeṇa prathamam uddiṣṭatvena tathā yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:24: mantram adhikṛtya so'yam ārambhaḥ tatrāgrataḥ paricitatvena mūla-rūpatvāt |
GR14brhms5cu:26: śrī-bhagavad-uktau - nāmnāṃ mukhyatamaṃ nāma kṛṣṇākhyaṃ me
GR14brhms5cu:29: sahasra-nāmnāṃ puṇyānāṃ trir-āvṛttyā tu yat phalam |
GR14brhms5cu:30: ekāvṛttyā tu kṛṣṇasya nāmaikaṃ tat prayacchati ||
GR14brhms5cu:31: ity atra śrī-kṛṣṇasyety evoktaṃ yat tv agre govinda-nāmnā stoṣyate tat khalu
GR14brhms5cu:33: tad evaṃ rūḍhitvena prādhānyāt tasya iśvara ity ādīni viśeṣaṇāni | atha
GR14brhms5cu:35: āsan varṇās trayo hy asya gṛhṇato 'nuyugaṃ tanūḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:36: śuklo raktas tathā pīta idānīṃ kṛṣṇatāṃ gataḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:37: bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te |
GR14brhms5cu:38: guṇa-karmānurūpāṇi tānya ahaṃ veda no janāḥ || [BhP 10.8.13-14]
GR14brhms5cu:39: anayor arthaḥ | asya kṛṣṇatvena dṛśyamānasya prati-yugaṃ tanūr nānāvatārān
GR14brhms5cu:40: gṛhṇataḥ prakāśyataḥ śuklādayas trayo āsan prakāśam avāpuḥ | sa ca sa ca
GR14brhms5cu:41: śuklādir avatāra idānīṃ sākṣād asyāvatāra-samaye kṛṣṇāṅgataḥ etasminn
GR14brhms5cu:42: evāntarbhūtaḥ | ataiva kṛṣṇe kartṛtvāt sarvotkarṣakatvāt kṛṣṇa iti mukhyaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:43: nāma | tasmād asyaiva tāni rūpāṇīty āha bahūnīti | tad evaṃ guṇa-dvārā
GR14brhms5cu:44: tan-nāmni prādhyānya-sūcakasya kṛṣṇasya tan-nāmnaḥ prādhānye labdhe -
GR14brhms5cu:45: kṛṣir bhū-vācakaḥ śabdo ṇaś ca nirvṛtivācakaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:46: tayor aikyaṃ paraṃ brahma kṛṣṇa ity abhidhīyate ||
GR14brhms5cu:47: iti yoga-vṛttitve tasya tādṛśatvaṃ labhyate | na cedaṃ padyam anya-param |
GR14brhms5cu:52: tasmād ayam arthaḥ - bhavanty asmāt sarve'rthā iti bhūḥ dhātv-artha ucyate
GR14brhms5cu:53: bhāva-śadavat sa cātra karṣter evārthas tasyaiva prāptatvāt | gautamīye
GR14brhms5cu:55: sattā-vācakam ity ukte ghaṭa-sattaiva gamyate na tu paṭa-sattā na vā
GR14brhms5cu:57: atha nivṛttir ānandas tayor aikyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena vyaktaṃ yat paraṃ
GR14brhms5cu:58: brahma sarvato'pi sarvasyāpi bṛṃhaṇaṃ vastu tat bṛhattamaṃ kṛṣṇa ity
GR14brhms5cu:59: abhidhīyate kintu kṛṣer ākarṣa-mātrārthatvena ṇa-śabdasya ca
GR14brhms5cu:61: abhedopacāraḥ kāryaḥ | tac cākarṣa-prācuryārtham āyur ghṛtam itivat |
GR14brhms5cu:62: brahma-śabdasya tat-tad-arthatvaṃ ca bṛhattvād bṛṃhaṇatvāc ca tad brahma
GR14brhms5cu:66: sattā-svānandayor yogāt cit paraṃ brahma cocyate || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:67: advaya-vādibhir api sattānandayor aikyaṃ tathā mantavyam | śābdikair
GR14brhms5cu:68: bhinnābhidheyatvena pratīteḥ | sattā-śabdena cātra sarveṣāṃ satāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:69: pravṛtti-hetur yat paramaṃ sa tad evocyate | sad eva saumyedam agra āsīd
GR14brhms5cu:70: [Chā 6.2.1] iti śruteḥ | abhinnābhidheyatve'pi vṛkṣas tarur ityvad
GR14brhms5cu:71: viśeṣaṇa-viśeṣyatvāyogād ekasya vaiyarthyāc ca | gautamīyaṃ padyaṃ caiva
GR14brhms5cu:72: vyākhyeyam | pūrvārdhe sarvākarṣaṇa-śakti-viśiṣṭa ānandaḥ kṛṣṇa ity
GR14brhms5cu:73: arthaḥ | uttarārdhe yasmād evaṃ sarvākarṣaka-sukha-rūpo'sau tasmād ātmā
GR14brhms5cu:74: jīvaś ca tatra sukha-rūpo bhavet | tatra hetu-bhāvaḥ premā
GR14brhms5cu:76: tad evaṃ svarūpa-guṇābhyāṃ parama-bṛhattamaḥ sarvākarṣaka ānandaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:77: kṛṣṇa-śabda-vācya iti jñeyam | sa ca śabdaḥ śrī-devakīnandana eva rūḍhaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:79: nikhilam ānandayat iti | āhuś ca nāma-kaumudī-kārāḥ - kṛṣṇa-śabdasya
GR14brhms5cu:80: tamāla-śyāmala-tviṣi śrī-yaśodā-stanandhaye para-brahmaṇi rūḍhiḥ iti | tataś
GR14brhms5cu:81: cāsau śabdo nānyatra saṅkramaṇīyaḥ | yathāha bhaṭṭaḥ -
GR14brhms5cu:84: iti para-brahmatvaṃ ca śrīmad-bhāgavate gūḍhaṃ paraṃ brahma
GR14brhms5cu:85: manuṣya-liṅgam [BhP 7.15.58] iti, yan-mitraṃ paramānandaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma
GR14brhms5cu:87: paraṃ brahma narākṛti [ViP 4.11.2] iti | śrī-gītāsu ca brahmaṇo hi
GR14brhms5cu:88: pratiṣṭhāham [Gītā 14.27] iti | śrī-gopāla-tāpanīṣu ca yo'sau paraṃ brahma
GR14brhms5cu:90: atha mūlam anusarāmaḥ | yasmād eva tādṛk kṛṣṇa-śabda-vācyas tasmād
GR14brhms5cu:91: īśvaraḥ sarva-vaśāyitā | tad idam upalakṣitaṃ bṛhad-gautamīye
GR14brhms5cu:94: kāla-rūpeṇa bhagavān tenāyaṃ kṛṣṇa ucyate || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:95: kalayati niyamayati sarvam iti kāla-śabdārthaḥ | tathā ca tṛtīye tam
GR14brhms5cu:101: śrī-gītāsu viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat [Gītā 10.42] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:102: śrī-gopāla-tāpanyām-eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍyaḥ [GTU 1.19] iti | yasmād
GR14brhms5cu:103: eva tādṛg-īśvaraḥ, tasmāt paramaḥ | sarvotkṛṣṭā mā lakṣmī-rūpāḥ śaktayo
GR14brhms5cu:104: yasmin | tad uktaṃ śrī-bhāgavate --reme ramābhir nija-kāma-samplutaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:105: [BhP 10.59.43] iti | nāyaṃ śriyo'ṅga u nitānta-rateḥ prasādaḥ [BhP 10.47.60]
GR14brhms5cu:106: ityādi | tatrātiśuśubhe tābhir bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ [BhP 10.33.6] iti | tābhir
GR14brhms5cu:107: vidhūta-śokābhir bhagavān acyuto vṛtaḥ | vyarocatādhikam [BhP 10.32.20] iti
GR14brhms5cu:108: ca | atraivāgre vakṣyate - śriyaḥ kāntāḥ kāntaḥ parama-puruṣaḥ [BrahmaS
GR14brhms5cu:109: 5.56] iti | tāpanyāṃ ca -kṛṣṇo vai paramaṃ daivatam [GTU 1.3] iti | yasmād eva
GR14brhms5cu:110: tādṛk paramas tasmād ādiś ca | tad uktaṃ śrī-daśame -
GR14brhms5cu:112: āhopāyaṃ tam evādya uddhavo yam uvāca ha || [BhP 10.72.15] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:113: ṭīkā ca svāmi-pādānām - ādyo hariḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa ity eṣā | ekādaśe tu tasya
GR14brhms5cu:114: śreṣṭhatvam ādyatvaṃ ca yugapad āha | puruṣam ṛṣabham ādyaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:116: na caitad āditvaṃ tad-avatārāpekṣaṃ kintu anādi na vidyate ādir yasya
GR14brhms5cu:117: tādṛśaḥ | tāpanyāṃ ca -- eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍyaḥ ity uktvāha nityo
GR14brhms5cu:118: nityānām iti ca yasmād eva tādṛśatayā ādis tasmāt sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam |
GR14brhms5cu:119: tathā ca daśame taṃ prati devakī-vākyam -
GR14brhms5cu:121: bhavanti kila viśvātmaṃs taṃ tvādyāhaṃ gatiṃ gatā || [BhP 10.85.31] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:122: ṭīkā ca - yasyāṃśaḥ puruṣas tasyāṃśo māyā tasyā aṃśā guṇās teṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:123: bhāgena paramāṇu-mātra-leśena viśvotpatty-ādayo bhavanti | taṃ tvā tvāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:124: gatiṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāsmi ity eṣā | tathā ca brahma-stutau - nārāyaṇo'ṅga
GR14brhms5cu:126: narāj jātāni tattvāni nārāṇīti vidur budhāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:127: tasya tāny ayanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:128: ity anena lakṣito yo nārāyaṇaḥ sa tavāṅgaṃ tvaṃ punar aṅgīty arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:129: śrī-gītāsu viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti | tad evaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:131: ye ca tac-chabdena kṛṣiṇābhyāṃ paramānanda-mātraṃ vācayanti te'pi
GR14brhms5cu:132: īśvarādi-viśeṣaṇais tatra svābhāvikī śaktiṃ manyeran | tasmin na
GR14brhms5cu:133: dvitīyatvena sarva-kāraṇatvena ca vastv-antara-śaktiṃ manyeran | tasmin na
GR14brhms5cu:134: dvitīyatvena sarva-kāraṇatvena ca vastv-antara-śakty-āropāyogāt | tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:135: śrutiḥ - ānando brahma iti | ko hy evānyāt kaḥ prāṇyād yad eṣa ākāśa
GR14brhms5cu:136: ānando na syāt | ānandād dhīmāni bhūtāni jāyante | [TaittU 2.7.1]
GR14brhms5cu:137: na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate
GR14brhms5cu:141: nanu sva-mate yoga-vṛttau ca sarvākarṣakaṃ parama-bṛhattamānandaḥ kṛṣṇa
GR14brhms5cu:142: ity abhidhānāt avigraha eva sa ity avagamyate ānandasya vigrahānavagamāt |
GR14brhms5cu:143: satyam | kintv ayaṃ paramo'pūrvaḥ pūrva-siddhānanda-vigrahaḥ iti |
GR14brhms5cu:144: sac-cid-ānanda-lakṣaṇo yo vigrahas tad-rūpa evety arthaḥ | tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:145: śrī-daśame brahmaṇaḥ stave tvayy eva nitya-sukha-bodha-tanāv iti |
GR14brhms5cu:149: etad uktaṃ bhavati | sattvaṃ khalv avyabhicāritvam ucyate tad-rūpatvaṃ ca tasya
GR14brhms5cu:151: satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ satyam atra pratiṣṭhitam |
GR14brhms5cu:152: satyāt satyaṃ ca govindas tasmāt satyo hi nāmataḥ || [Mbh 5.68.12] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:161: svasthaḥ śete mṛtyur asmād apaiti || [BhP 10.3.24] ity ādi |
GR14brhms5cu:162: eko'si prathamam [BhP 10.14.18] ity ādi śrī-brahmaṇo vākye tad amitaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:163: brahmādvayaṃ śiṣyate iti | śrī-gītāsu brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti |
GR14brhms5cu:164: yasmāt kṣaram atīto'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:165: ato'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:167: janma-jarābhyāṃ bhinnaḥ sthānur ayam acchedyo'yaṃ yo'sau saurye tiṣṭhati |
GR14brhms5cu:168: yo'sau goṣu tiṣṭhati, yo'sau gāḥ pālayati, yo'sau gopeṣu tiṣṭhati govindān
GR14brhms5cu:169: mṛtyur bibheti || [GTU 2.23] ity ādi ca | tatra pūrvatra saurya iti | saurī
GR14brhms5cu:170: yamunā, tad adūra-deśe vṛndāvane ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:171: atha cid-rūpatvaṃ sva-prakāśatvena para-prakāśatvam | tac coktaṃ śrī-daśame
GR14brhms5cu:172: brahmaṇā ekas tvam ātmā ity ādau svayaṃ jyotīr iti | tāpanyāṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:179: tasyaiṣa ātmā vṛṇute tanuṃ svām || ity śruty-antaravat |
GR14brhms5cu:181: ca śrī-daśame brahma-stavānte - brahman parodbhave kṛṣṇe [BhP 10.14.49]
GR14brhms5cu:183: vidito 'si bhavān sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
GR14brhms5cu:186: tad evaṃ tasya sac-cid-ānanda-vigraha-rūpatve siddhe, vigraha evātmā
GR14brhms5cu:187: tathātmaiva vigraha iti siddham | tato jīvavad dehitvaṃ tasya nety api
GR14brhms5cu:189: kṛṣṇam enam avehi tvam ātmānam akhilātmanām |
GR14brhms5cu:190: jagad-dhitāya so'py atra dehīvābhāti māyayā || [BhP 10.14.55] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:191: tathāpi tasya dehival-līlā-kṛpā-paravaśatayaivety arthaḥ | māyā dambhe
GR14brhms5cu:192: kṛpāyāṃ ca iti viśva-prakāśaḥ | tad evam asya tathā
GR14brhms5cu:194: vṛṣṇīndratvaṃ kvacid govindatvaṃ ca dṛśyate | tathāha dvādaśe śrī-sūtaḥ --
GR14brhms5cu:199: tad evam api svābhīṣṭa-rūpa-līlā-parikara-viśiṣṭatayā govindatvam eva
GR14brhms5cu:200: svārādhyatvena yojayati govinda iti | yathā atraivāgre stoṣyate
GR14brhms5cu:201: cintāmaṇi-prakara-sadmasu kalpa-vṛkṣa iti | abhiṣekānte govinda iti
GR14brhms5cu:202: cābhyadhāt [BhP 10.27.23] ity uktvā tat prakaraṇārambhe śrī-śuka-prārthanā
GR14brhms5cu:203: prīyān na indro gavām [BhP 10.26.25] iti gavāṃ sarvāśrayatvād
GR14brhms5cu:204: gavendratvenaiva sarvendratva-siddheḥ | na cedaṃ nyūnaṃ mantavyam | tathā
GR14brhms5cu:206: gobhyo yajñāḥ pravartante gobhyo devāḥ samutthitāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:208: astu tāvat parama-golokāvatīrṇānāṃ tāsāṃ gavām indratvam iti tāpanīṣu ca
GR14brhms5cu:209: brahmaṇā tadīyam eva svenārādhanaṃ prakāśitam -- govindaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:212: tathaiva daśame -- tad bhūri bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyām
GR14brhms5cu:213: [BhP 10.14.34] ity ādi, śrī-nanda-nandanatvenaiva ca taṃ labdhuṃ prārthanā |
GR14brhms5cu:214: naumīḍya te'bhra-vapuṣe taḍid-ambarāya ity ādi paśupāṅgajāya [BhP 10.14.1]
GR14brhms5cu:216: tad evaṃ govinda-śabdasya nānā-pāramaiśvarya-mayy anyārthatāpi tena
GR14brhms5cu:224: anayor vallabhaḥ proktaḥ svāmī kṛṣṇākhya īśvaraḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:228: prakṛtim iti māyākhyāṃ jagat-kāraṇa-śaktim ity arthaḥ tattva-samūhako
GR14brhms5cu:229: mahad-ādi-rūpaḥ | anayor āśrayaḥ sāndrānandaṃ paraṃ jyotir īśvarao
GR14brhms5cu:230: vallabha-śabdena kathyate | īśvaratve hetur vyāptyā kāraṇatvena ceti |
GR14brhms5cu:231: prakṛtir iti svarūpa-bhūtā māyātītā vaikuṇṭhādau prakāśamānā
GR14brhms5cu:232: mahā-lakṣmy-ākhyā śaktir ity arthaḥ | aṃśa-maṇḍalaṃ saṅkarṣaṇādi-rūpam |
GR14brhms5cu:233: aneka-janma-siddhānām ity atra | bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna
GR14brhms5cu:236: tad evam atrāpi nanda-nandanatvam evābhimataṃ śrī-gargeṇa ca yathoktam |
GR14brhms5cu:237: prāg ayaṃ vāsudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [BhP 10.8.14] iti | ātmajatvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:238: hi tasya śrī-vasudevasyāpi manasy āvirbhūtatvam evābhimatam |
GR14brhms5cu:240: api dadhāra sarvātmakam ātma-bhūtaṃ kāṣṭhā yathānanda-karaṃ manastaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:241: [BhP 10.2.18] ity ādeḥ | śrī-vrajeśvarayo'pi tathāsīd eva phalena
GR14brhms5cu:243: pūrvāvyavahita-kālaṃ vyāpya tathā tathā sarvatra darśanāt | kintv ātmani
GR14brhms5cu:245: prayojakam | brahmaṇaḥ sakāśād varāha-devasyāvirbhāve'pi parasparaṃ tathā
GR14brhms5cu:246: bhāva-darśanābhāvāt | tathā nṛsiṃha-devaḥ stambhayor api | na ca vaktavyam
GR14brhms5cu:247: udara-praveśe sati putratvaṃ syāt | parīkṣid-rakṣaṇārthaṃ tan-mātur
GR14brhms5cu:251: pratibandhakaṃ iti sādhūktaṃ prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya iti |
GR14brhms5cu:252: atha śrī-śukadevena tathaiva nirṇītaṃ nāyaṃ sukhāpo bhagavān dehināṃ
GR14brhms5cu:254: nanda-gopa-tanayo devatā iti | ataḥ śrīmad-daśākṣara-viniyoge'pi tan-maya
GR14brhms5cu:255: eva dṛśyate iti | atha viśeṣaḥ śrī-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇyāṃ nandas tv ātmaja
GR14brhms5cu:262: atha tasya tad-rūpatā-sādhakaṃ nityaṃ dhāma pratipādayati sahasra-patraṃ
GR14brhms5cu:263: kamalam ity ādinā | sahasrāṇi patrāṇi yatra tat kamalam | bhūmiś
GR14brhms5cu:265: tad-rūpaṃ mahat sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ padaṃ sthānam | mahataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya
GR14brhms5cu:266: mahā-bhagavato vā padaṃ mahā-vaikuṇṭhādi-rūpaṃ ity arthaḥ | rūḍhir
GR14brhms5cu:267: yogam apaharatīti nyāyena tasyaiva pratīteḥ | etad abhipretyoktaṃ śrī-daśame
GR14brhms5cu:268: bhagavān gokuleśvaraḥ iti śīlārthe tv atra varac-pratyayaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:269: ataiva tad-anukūlatvenottara-grantho'pi vyākhyeyaḥ | tad eva cāmnātaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:270: gokulaṃ vana-vaikuṇṭham iti | tasya śrī-kṛṣṇasya dhāma
GR14brhms5cu:272: sahavāsitātvagre samuddekṣyate | tasya svarūpam āha tad iti | anantasya
GR14brhms5cu:274: tat tathā tantreṇaitad api bodhyate | ananto'ṃśo yasya tasya śrī-baladevasyāpi
GR14brhms5cu:283: mukhya-pīṭham idam ity āha karṇikāram iti dvayena | mahad-yantram iti |
GR14brhms5cu:284: yat prakṛtir eva sarvatra mantratvena pūjārthaṃ likhyate ity arthaḥ | yantram
GR14brhms5cu:285: eva darśayati ṣaṭ-koṇā abhyantare yasya tat | vajra-kīlakaṃ karṇikāre
GR14brhms5cu:287: catur-akṣarī kīla-rūpā jñeyā | ṣaṭ-koṇatve prayojanam āha ṣaḍ-aṅgāni
GR14brhms5cu:288: yasyāḥ sā ṣaṭ-padī śrīmad-aṣṭādaśākṣarī tasyāḥ sthānam | prakṛtir
GR14brhms5cu:289: mantrasya svarūpaṃ svayam eva śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ, kāraṇa-rūpatvāt | tac coktam
GR14brhms5cu:291: puruṣaś ca sa eva tad-adhiṣṭhātṛ-devatā-rūpaḥ | tābhyām avasthitam
GR14brhms5cu:292: adhiṣṭhitam | sa hi mantre caturdhā pratīyate | mantrasya kāraṇa-rūpatvena,
GR14brhms5cu:295: ārādhya-rūpatvena prāg uktaḥ | īśvaraḥ paramaḥ kṛṣṇa iti |
GR14brhms5cu:296: varṇa-rūpatvenāgre uddhariṣyate kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāya iti | yathoktaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:305: kvacid durgāyā adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ śakti-śaktimator abheda-vivakṣayā yathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:307: rādhā durgā śivā durgā lakṣmī durgā prakīrtitā |
GR14brhms5cu:310: yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saiva durgā syād yā durgā kṛṣṇa eva saḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:311: anayor antarādarśī saṃsārān no vimucyate || ity ādi |
GR14brhms5cu:312: ataḥ svayam eva śrī-kṛṣṇas tatra svarūpa-śakti-rūpeṇa durgā nāmeti | tasmān
GR14brhms5cu:313: neyaṃ māyāṃśa-bhūtā durgātigamyate | niruktiś cātra kṛcchreṇa
GR14brhms5cu:314: durgārādhanādi bahu-prayāsena gamyate jñāyate iti | tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:316: jānāty ekā parā-kāntaṃ saiva durgā tad-ātmikā |
GR14brhms5cu:319: muhūrtād eva devasya prāptir bhavati nānyathā ||
GR14brhms5cu:326: yayā mugdhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sarva-dehābhimānataḥ || iti ca |
GR14brhms5cu:327: tathā ca sammohana-tantre jayāṃ prati śrī-durgā-vacanaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:328: yan nāmnā nāmnī durgāhaṃ guṇair guṇavatī hy aham |
GR14brhms5cu:329: yad-vaibhavā mahā-lakṣmī rādhā nityāparā dvayā || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:330: kiṃ ca prema-rūpā ye ānanda-mahānanda-rasās tat paripāka-bhedās
GR14brhms5cu:331: tad-ātmakena tathā jyotī-rūpeṇa sva-prakāśakena manunā mantra-rūpeṇa
GR14brhms5cu:332: kāma-bījena saṅgatam iti mūlāntargatatve'pi kāma-bījasya pṛthag-uktiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:335: tat-kiñjalkaṃ tad-aṃśānāṃ tat-patrāṇi śriyām api ||4|| // BrS_5.5 //
GR14brhms5cu:337: tad evaṃ tad-dhāmoktvā tad-āvaraṇāny āha tad ity ardhena | tasya
GR14brhms5cu:339: arthaḥ | tac ca tad-aṃśānāṃ tasminn aṃśodāyo vidyate yeṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:340: parama-prema-bhājāṃ sajātīyānāṃ dhāmety arthaḥ | gokulākhyam ity uktir
GR14brhms5cu:343: viveśa goṣṭhaṃ sa-balo gopīnāṃ nayanotsavaḥ || [BhP 10.36.15] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:344: kaṃsa-vadhānte śrī-vraja-rājaṃ prati svayaṃ bhagavatā - jñātīn vo draṣṭum
GR14brhms5cu:345: eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham [BhP 10.45.23] iti | ataiva kamalasya patrāṇi
GR14brhms5cu:347: dhāmānīty arthaḥ | gopī-rūpatvaṃ cāsāṃ mantrasya tan-nāmnāliṅgitatvāt
GR14brhms5cu:350: sarva-lakṣmī-mayī sarva-kāntiḥ sammohinī parā || iti bṛhad-gautamīyāt |
GR14brhms5cu:352: rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane || iti matsya-purāṇāt |
GR14brhms5cu:353: rādhayā mādhavo devo mādhavenaiva rādhikā | vibhrājante janeṣv ā iti
GR14brhms5cu:355: atra viśeṣa-jijñāsāyāṃ kṛṣṇārcana-dīpikā draṣṭavyā | tatra patrāṇām
GR14brhms5cu:356: ucchrita-prāntānāṃ vartmāṇy agrima-sandhiṣu tu goṣṭhāni jñeyāni |
GR14brhms5cu:357: akhaṇḍa-kamalasya gokulatvāt tathaiva gokula-samāveśāc ca goṣṭhaṃ tathaiva
GR14brhms5cu:362: prabhāvaḥ satyaḥ śrī-parama-puruṣas taṃ kila bhaje || iti padma-bīja-koṣe ity
GR14brhms5cu:364: tatra go-saṅkhyair iti tu pāṭhaḥ samañjasaḥ | go-saṅkhyāś ca gopāḥ iti | gope
GR14brhms5cu:366: prakaṭitaḥ prabhāvaḥ yena saḥ parama-puruṣaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa ity arthaḥ ||4||
GR14brhms5cu:370: caturbhiḥ puruṣārthaiś ca caturbhir hetubhir vṛtam |
GR14brhms5cu:371: śūlair daśabhir ānaddham ūrdhvādho dig-vidikṣv api || // BrS_5.7 //
GR14brhms5cu:372: aṣṭabhir nidhibhir juṣṭam aṣṭabhiḥ siddhibhis tathā
GR14brhms5cu:373: manu-rūpaiś ca daśabhir dik-pālaiḥ parito vṛtam || // BrS_5.8 //
GR14brhms5cu:374: śyāmair gauraiś ca raktaiś ca śuklaiś ca pārṣadarṣabhaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:375: śobhitaṃ śaktibhis tābhir adbhutābhiḥ samantataḥ ||5|| // BrS_5.9 //
GR14brhms5cu:377: atha gokulāvaraṇāny āha caturasram iti caturbhiḥ | tasya gokulasya bahiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:378: sarvataś caturasraṃ catuṣkoṇātmakaṃ sthānaṃ śvetadvīpākhyam | tad etad
GR14brhms5cu:379: upalakṣaṇaṃ golokākhyaṃ cety arthaḥ | yadyapi gokule śvetadvīpatvam asty
GR14brhms5cu:380: eva tad-avāntara-bhūmimayatvāt | tathāpi viśeṣa-nāmnoktatvāt tenaiva tat
GR14brhms5cu:381: pratīyate iti tathoktam | kintu caturasre'py antar-maṇḍalaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:382: śrī-vṛndāvanākhyaṃ jñeyam | tathā ca svāyambhuvāgame - dhyāyet
GR14brhms5cu:383: tatra-viśuddhātmā idaṃ sarvaṃ krameṇa ca ity ādikam uktvā tan-madhye
GR14brhms5cu:384: vṛndāvanaṃ kusumitaṃ nānā-vṛkṣa-vihaṅgamaṃ saṃsmaret ity uktam | tathā
GR14brhms5cu:385: ca bṛhad-vāmane śrutīnāṃ prārthanā pūrvakāṇi padyāni
GR14brhms5cu:386: ānanda-mātram iti yad vadanti hi purāvidaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:387: tad-rūpe darśayāsmākaṃ yadi deyo varo hi naḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:388: śrutvaitad darśayāmāsa svaṃ lokaṃ prakṛteḥ param |
GR14brhms5cu:390: yatra vṛndāvanaṃ nāma vanaṃ kāma-dughair drumaiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:391: manorama-nikuñjāḍhyaṃ sarvartu-sukha-saṃyutam || ity ādi tac ca caturasram |
GR14brhms5cu:393: vibhaktam catur-dhāma | kintu deva-līlatvāt tad-upari-vyoma-yāna-sthā eva
GR14brhms5cu:395: sva-sva-mantrātmakaiḥ | dik-pālaiḥ indrādibhiḥ | śyāmādayaḥ catvāro vedāḥ
GR14brhms5cu:396: tair ity arthaḥ | kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra chandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ iti
GR14brhms5cu:398: tad evaṃ goloka-nāmā ayaṃ lokaḥ śrī-bhāgavate sādhitaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:400: kṛṣṇe ca sannatiṃ teṣāṃ jñātibhyo vismito 'bravīt ||
GR14brhms5cu:401: te cautsukya-dhiyo rājan matvā gopās tam īśvaram |
GR14brhms5cu:402: api naḥ svagatiṃ sūkṣmām upādhāsyad adhīśvaram ||
GR14brhms5cu:403: iti svānāṃ sa bhagavān vijñāyākhila-dṛk svayam |
GR14brhms5cu:406: uccāvacāsu gatiṣu na veda svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman ||
GR14brhms5cu:408: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param ||
GR14brhms5cu:409: satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ yat brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam |
GR14brhms5cu:410: yad dhi paśyanti munayo guṇāpāye samāhitāḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:411: te tu brahma-hradaṃ nītā magnāḥ kṛṣṇena coddhṛtāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:414: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra cchandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ || [BhP 10.28.10-17] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:415: atīndriyam adṛṣṭa-pūrvam | sva-gatiṃ sva-dhāma | sūkṣmāṃ durjñeyām |
GR14brhms5cu:416: upādhāsyan upadhāsyati | asmān prāpayiṣyatīty arthaḥ | iti saṅkalpitavanta
GR14brhms5cu:417: iti śeṣaḥ | jano'sau vraja-vāsī mama svajanaḥ | sālokya-sārṣṭi- [BhP 3.29.12]
GR14brhms5cu:418: ity ādi padye janā itivad ubhayatrāpy anya-janatvam aprastutatam iti |
GR14brhms5cu:419: vraja-janasya tu tadīya-svajanatamatvaṃ tena svayam eva vibhāvitam -
GR14brhms5cu:421: gopāye svātma-yogena so'yaṃ me vrata āhitaḥ || [BhP 10.25.18] ity anena |
GR14brhms5cu:422: sa etasmin prāpañcike loke avidyābhir yā uccāvacā deva-tiryag-ādi-rūpā
GR14brhms5cu:423: gatayas tāsu svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman tan-miśratayābhivyakteḥ tan-nirviśeṣatayā
GR14brhms5cu:424: jānan, tām eva svāṃ gatiṃ bhaved ity arthaḥ madīya-laukika-līlāveśena
GR14brhms5cu:428: iti śrī-daśamokter avidyā-kāma-karmaṇāṃ tatrāsāmarthyāt | gopīnāṃ svāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:429: lokaṃ golokam iti | arthāt tān praty eva sandarśayāmāsa | tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ
GR14brhms5cu:430: param svarūpa-śaktyābhivyaktatvāt | ataiva saccidānanda-rūpa evāsau loka ity
GR14brhms5cu:432: atha śrī-vṛndāvane tādṛśa-darśanaṃ katama-deśa-sthitānāṃ teṣām ity ata
GR14brhms5cu:433: āha te tv iti | brahma-hradaṃ akrūra-tīrthaṃ kṛṣṇena nītā punaś ca tenaiva
GR14brhms5cu:434: magnāḥ majjitāḥ punaś ca tasmāt tenaivoddhṛtāḥ | uddhṛtya punaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:435: sva-sthāna-prāpitāḥ santo, brahmaṇaḥ parama-bṛhattamasya tasyaiva lokaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:436: golokākhyaṃ dadṛśuḥ | mūrdhabhiḥ satya-lokas tu brahma-lokaḥ sanātanaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:438: ko'sau brahma-hradaḥ ? tatrāha yatreti | purety etat-prasaṅgād bhāvi-kāla ity
GR14brhms5cu:439: arthaḥ | purā purāṇe nikaṭe prabandhātīta-bhāviṣu iti koṣa-kārāḥ | seyaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:440: ca paripāṭī tat tīrthaṃ mahimānaṃ lakṣyam eva vidhātum iti bhāvaḥ | tatra
GR14brhms5cu:441: svāṃ gatim iti tadīyatā-nirdeśo gopānāṃ svaṃ lokam iti ṣaṣṭhī-sva-śabdayor
GR14brhms5cu:442: nirdeśaḥ | kṛṣṇam iti sākṣān-nirdeśaś ca vaikuṇṭhāntaraṃ vyavacchidya
GR14brhms5cu:446: tatra soma-gatiś caiva jyotiṣāṃ ca mahātmanām ||
GR14brhms5cu:447: tasyopari gavāṃ lokaḥ sādhyās taṃ pālayanti hi |
GR14brhms5cu:448: sa hi sarva-gataḥ kṛṣṇa mahākāśa-gato mahān ||
GR14brhms5cu:449: upary upari tatrāpi gatis tava tapomayī |
GR14brhms5cu:450: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto'pi pitāmaham |
GR14brhms5cu:452: brāhmye tapasi yuktānāṃ brahma-lokaḥ parā gatiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:453: gavām eva tu yo loko durāroho hi sā gatiḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:454: sa tu lokas tvayā kṛṣṇa sīdamānaḥ kṛtātmanā |
GR14brhms5cu:455: dhṛto dhṛtimatā vīra nighantopdadravān gavām || [HV 2.19.29-35] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:456: tatrāpāta-pratītārthāntare svargād ūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇo loka ity ayuktaṃ syāt
GR14brhms5cu:457: loka-trayam atikramyokteḥ | tatra soma-gatiś caivety api na sambhavati
GR14brhms5cu:458: candrasyānyeṣām api jyotiṣāṃ dhruva-lokādhastād eva gateḥ | tatra sādhyās
GR14brhms5cu:459: taṃ pālayantīty api nopapadyate | deva-yoni-rūpāṇāṃ teṣāṃ svarga-lokasyāpi
GR14brhms5cu:460: pālanam asambhavyam | kim uta tad-upari golokasya | tathā tasya lokasya
GR14brhms5cu:461: surabhi-lokatve sati sarva-gata ity anupapannaṃ syāt |
GR14brhms5cu:462: śrī-bhagavad-vigraha-lokayor acintya-śaktitvena vibhutvaṃ ghaṭate na punar
GR14brhms5cu:463: asyeti | ataiva sarvātītatvāt tatrāpi tava gatir ity api śabdo vismaye prayuktaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:464: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve ity-ādikaṃ coktam |
GR14brhms5cu:465: tasmāt prākṛta-golokād anya evāsau goloka iti siddham | tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:468: brahma-lokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam || [Mbh 12.330.68] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:472: iti dvitīyānusāreṇa svar-lokam ārabhya satya-loka-paryantaṃ loka-pañcakam
GR14brhms5cu:473: ucyate | tasmād ūrdhvam upari brahma-loko brahmātmako loko brahma-lokaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:474: sac-cid-ānanda-rūpatvāt | brahmaṇo bhagavato loka iti vā | mūrdhabhiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:475: satya-lokas tu brahma-lokaḥ sanātanaḥ [BhP 2.5.38] iti dvitīyāt | tathā ca ṭīkā
GR14brhms5cu:476: -brahma-loko vaikuṇṭhākhyaḥ | sanātano nityaḥ | na tu sṛjyaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:477: prapañcāntarvartī | ity eṣā | śrutiś ca eṣa brahma-lokaḥ | eṣa ātma-lokaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:479: sa ca brahmarṣi-gaṇa-sevitaḥ | brahmāṇi mūrtimanto vedāḥ | ṛṣayaś ca
GR14brhms5cu:480: śrī-nāradādayaḥ | gaṇāś ca śrī-garuḍa-viṣvaksenādayaḥ | taiḥ sevitaḥ | evaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:481: nityāśritān uktvā tad-gamanādhikāriṇa āha | tatra brahma-loke umayā saha
GR14brhms5cu:482: vartata iti somaḥ śrī-śivas tasya gatiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:484: viriñcatām eti tataḥ paraṃ hi mām |
GR14brhms5cu:486: padaṃ yathāhaṃ vibudhāḥ kalātyaye || [BhP 4.24.29] iti caturthe
GR14brhms5cu:488: someti supāṃ sulug ity ādinā ṣaṣṭhyā luk chāndasaḥ | tata uttaratrāpi gatir
GR14brhms5cu:489: ity asyānvayaḥ | jyotir brahma tad-aikātmya-bhāvānāṃ muktānām ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:490: nanu tādṛśām api sarveṣāṃ kintu mahātmanāṃ mahāśayānāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:493: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahā-mune || [BhP 6.14.5] iti ṣaṣṭhāt |
GR14brhms5cu:495: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ || [Gītā 6.47] iti
GR14brhms5cu:497: teṣv eva mahattva-paryavasanāt | tasya ca brahma-lokasyopari
GR14brhms5cu:498: sarvordhva-pradeśe gavāṃ lokaḥ śrī-goloka ity arthaḥ | taṃ ca golokaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:500: nitya-tadīya-deva-gaṇāḥ pālayanti dik-pālatayā vartante te ha nākaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:501: mahimānaḥ sacantaḥ yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ [Rk 10.90.16] iti śruteḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:502: tatra pūrve ye ca sādhyā viśve devāḥ sanātanāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:503: te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacantaḥ śubha-darśanāḥ || iti
GR14brhms5cu:505: yad vā tad bhūri-bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyāṃ yad gokule'pi
GR14brhms5cu:509: tad evaṃ sarvopari-gatatve'pi | hi prasiddhau | sa śrī-golokaḥ sarva-gataḥ
GR14brhms5cu:514: ataiva mahān bhagavad-rūpa eva | mahāntaṃ vibhum ātmānam [KaṭhU 2.22]
GR14brhms5cu:515: iti śruteḥ | tatra hetuḥ | mahākāśaḥ parama-vyomākhyaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:518: tad evam upary upari sarvopary api virājamāne tatra śrī-goloke'pi tava gatiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:520: ataiva sā ca gatiḥ sādhāraṇī na bhavati kintu tapomayī |
GR14brhms5cu:521: tapo'trānavacchinnaiśvaryaṃ sahasra-nāma-bhāṣye'pi paramaṃ yo mahat tapaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:522: ity atra tatra vyākhyātam | sa tapo'tapyata iti parameśvara-viṣayaka-śruteḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:523: aiśvaryaṃ prākāśayad iti tatrārthaḥ | ataiva brahmādi-durvitarkyatvam apy
GR14brhms5cu:524: āha yām iti | adhunā tasya śrī-goloka ity ākhyā bījam abhivyañjayati gatir
GR14brhms5cu:526: yuktānāṃ yata-cittānāṃ tat-prema-bhaktānām ity arthaḥ | yasya jñāna-mayaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:527: tapaḥ iti śruteḥ | brahma-loko vaikuṇṭha-lokaḥ | parā prakṛtyatītā | gavāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:529: ity-uktānusāreṇa atraiva nighnatopadravān gavām ity uktyā ca
GR14brhms5cu:530: goloka-vāsi-mātrāṇāṃ svatas tad-bhāva-bhāvitānāṃ ca sādhana-vaśād ity
GR14brhms5cu:531: arthaḥ | atas tad-bhāvasya durlabhatvād durārohā | tad evaṃ golokaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:532: varṇayitvā tasya gokulena sahābhedam āha sa tv iti |
GR14brhms5cu:533: sa eva tu sa loko dhṛto rakṣitaḥ śrī-govardhanoddharaṇeneti | evam eva
GR14brhms5cu:536: brahma-lokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam || [Mbh 12.330.68] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:538: ekadā sāntarīkṣāc ca vaikuṇṭhaṃ svecchayā bhuvi |
GR14brhms5cu:540: bhakti-rūpāṃ satāṃ bhaktim utpāditavatī bhṛśam || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:542: tat sarvopari goloke śrī-govindaḥ sadā svayam |
GR14brhms5cu:549: vyākhyātaṃ ca - tāṃ tāni vāṃ yuvayoḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmayor vāstūni līlā-sthānāni
GR14brhms5cu:550: gamadhyai prāptuṃ uśmasi kāmayāmahe | tāni kiṃ viśiṣṭāni ? yatra yeṣu
GR14brhms5cu:551: bhūri-śṛṅgā mahā-śṛṅgyo gāvo bahu-śubha-lakṣaṇā iti vā | ayāsaḥ śubhāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:552: ayaḥ śubhāvaho vidhir ity amaraḥ | devāsa itivat jasantaṃ padam | atra
GR14brhms5cu:553: bhūmau tal-loke vede ca prasiddhaṃ śrī-golokākhyaṃ urugāyasya svayaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:554: bhagavato tac-caraṇāravindasya paramaṃ prapañcātītaṃ padaṃ sthānaṃ bhūri
GR14brhms5cu:556: yajuḥsu - mādhyandinīyā stūyate dhāmāny uśmasi ity ādau | viṣṇoḥ
GR14brhms5cu:557: paramaṃ padam avabhātīti bhūrīti cātra prakārāntaraṃ paṭhanti śeṣaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:560: evaṃ jyotir-mayo devaḥ sad-ānandaṃ parāt paraḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:561: ātmārāmasya tasyāsti prakṛtyā na samāgamaḥ ||6|| // BrS_5.10 //
GR14brhms5cu:565: goloka-tad-adhiṣṭhātror apy āha evam iti | devo golokas
GR14brhms5cu:566: tad-adhiṣṭhātṛ-śrī-govinda-rūpaḥ | sadānandam iti tat-svarūpam ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:567: napuṃsakatvaṃ vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma iti śruteḥ | ātmārāmasya
GR14brhms5cu:568: anya-nirapekṣasya prakṛtyā māyayā na samāgamaḥ | yathoktaṃ dvitīye - na
GR14brhms5cu:569: yatra māyā kim utāpare harer anuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ [BhP 2.9.10] ||6||
GR14brhms5cu:572: ātmanā ramayā reme tyakta-kālaṃ sisṛkṣayā | // BrS_5.11 //
GR14brhms5cu:573: niyatiḥ sā ramā devi tat-priyā tad-vaśaṃ tadā ||7|| // BrS_5.12ab //
GR14brhms5cu:575: atha prapañcātmanas tad-aṃśasya puruṣasya tu na tādṛśatvam ity āha
GR14brhms5cu:578: nanu tarhi jīvavat-tal-liptatvena aniīśvaratvaṃ syāt ? tatrāha ātmaneti | sa tu
GR14brhms5cu:579: ātmanā antarvṛtyā tu ramayā svarūpa-śaktyaiva reme ratiṃ prāpnoti | bahir
GR14brhms5cu:582: yad yat kariṣyati gṛhīta-guṇāvatāraḥ || [BhP 3.9.23] iti tṛtīye brahma-stavāt |
GR14brhms5cu:583: atra -māyāṃ vyudasya cic-chaktyā kaivalye sthita ātmani [BhP 1.7.23] iti
GR14brhms5cu:584: prathame śrīmad-arjuna-vacanāt | tarhi tat-preraṇaṃ vinā kathaṃ sṛṣṭis
GR14brhms5cu:585: tatrāha | sisṛkṣayā sraṣṭum icchayā tyaktaḥ sṛṣṭy-arthaṃ prahitaḥ kālaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:586: yasmāt ramaṇāt tādṛśaṃ yathā syāt tathā reme | prathamānta-pāṭhas tu
GR14brhms5cu:587: sugamaḥ | tat prabhāva-rūpeṇa tenaiva sā sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:588: prabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kālam eke yato bhayam [BhP 3.26.16]
GR14brhms5cu:590: puruṣeṇātma-bhūtena vīryam ādhatta vīryavān || [BhP 3.5.26] iti ca tṛtīyāt |
GR14brhms5cu:591: nanu ramaiva sā kā tatrāha niyatir ity ardhena | niyamyate svayaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:592: bhagavatyeva nityatā bhavatīti niyatiḥ svarūpa-bhūtā tac-chaktiḥ | devī
GR14brhms5cu:593: dyotamānā sva-prakāśa-rūpā ity arthaḥ | tad-uktaṃ dvādaśe - anapāyinī
GR14brhms5cu:594: bhagavatī śrīḥ śākṣād ātmano hareḥ [BhP 12.11.20] iti | ṭīkā ca --
GR14brhms5cu:595: anapāyinī hareḥ śaktiḥ | tatra hetuḥ sākṣād ātmana iti svarūpasya
GR14brhms5cu:596: cid-rūpatvāt tasyās tad-abhedād ity arthaḥ | ity eṣā |
GR14brhms5cu:597: atra sākṣāt-śabdena vilajjamānayā yasya sthātum īkṣā-pathe'muyā ity
GR14brhms5cu:598: ā̆dy-uktyā māyā neti dhvanitam | tatrānapāyitvaṃ yathā viṣṇu-purāṇe
GR14brhms5cu:599: nityaiva sā jagan-mātā viṣṇoḥ śrīr anapāyinī
GR14brhms5cu:600: yathā sarva-gato viṣṇus tathaiveyaṃ dvijottamaḥ || [ViP 1.8.17] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:602: avatāraṃ karoty eṣā tathā śrīs tat-sahāyinī || [ViP 1.9.142] iti ca |
GR14brhms5cu:603: devatve deva-dehā sā mānuṣatve ca mānuṣī |
GR14brhms5cu:604: harer dehānṛ-rūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum || [ViP 1.9.145] iti ca |
GR14brhms5cu:605: hayaśīrṣa-pañcarātre - na viṣṇunā vinā devī na hariḥ padmajāṃ vinā iti ||
GR14brhms5cu:609: yā yoniḥ sāparā śaktiḥ kāmo bījaṃ mahad dhareḥ ||8|| // BrS_5.12 //
GR14brhms5cu:611: nanu kutrāpi śiva-śaktyoḥ kāraṇatā śrūyate, tatra virāḍ-varṇanavat
GR14brhms5cu:613: viśva-śaktir iyaṃ sthitā iti viṣṇu-purāṇānusāreṇa prapañcātmanas
GR14brhms5cu:615: puruṣasya liṅgaṃ liṅga-sthānīyaḥ yaḥ prapañcotpādako'ṃśaḥ sa eva
GR14brhms5cu:616: śambhuḥ | anyas tu tad-āvirbhāva-viśeṣatvād eva śambhur ucyate ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:617: vakṣyate ca kṣīraṃ yathā dadhi-vikāra-viśeṣa-yogād sañjāyate na tu tataḥ
GR14brhms5cu:619: tathā tasya vīryāvadhāna-sthāna-rūpāyā māyāyā apy aprakaṭa-rūpāyā yā
GR14brhms5cu:620: yonir yoni-sthānīyo'ṃśaḥ saivāparā pradhānākhyā śaktir iti pūrvavat | tatra
GR14brhms5cu:621: ca hares tasya puruṣākhya-hary-aṃśasya kāmo bhavati sṛṣṭy-arthaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:622: tad-didiṛkṣā jāyate ity arthaḥ | tataś ca mahad iti sa-jīva-mahat-tattva-rūpaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:627: vastutas tu pūrvābhiprāyatvam evety āha liṅgety ardhena | māheśvarīḥ
GR14brhms5cu:633: śaktimān ity ardhena tad evānūdya tasmin pūrvoktāprakaṭa-rūpasya
GR14brhms5cu:634: prakaṭa-rūpatayāpunar abhivyaktir ity āha tasminn ity ardhena | tasmāl
GR14brhms5cu:636: maheśvaro'py ucyate tataś ca tasmin bhūta-sūkṣma-paryantatāṃ prāpte liṅge
GR14brhms5cu:637: svayaṃ tad-aṃśī mahā-viṣṇur āvirabhūt prakaṭa-rūpeṇāvirbhavati | yato
GR14brhms5cu:638: jagatāṃ sarveṣāṃ parāvareṣāṃ jīvānāṃ sa eva patir iti || 10 ||
GR14brhms5cu:643: tad evaṃ rūpaṃ vivṛṇoti sahasra-śīrṣeti | sahasram aṃśā avatārā yasya sa
GR14brhms5cu:644: sahasrāṃśaḥ | sahasraṃ sūte sṛjati yaḥ sa sahasra-sūḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:645: sahasra-śabda-sarvatrāsaṅkhyatā-paraḥ | dvitīye ca tasyaiva rūpam idam
GR14brhms5cu:646: uktam -- ādyo'vatāraḥ puruṣaḥ parasya [BhP 2.6.42] iti | asya ṭīkāyāṃ - yasya
GR14brhms5cu:647: sahasra-śīrṣety ukto līlā-vigrahaḥ parasya bhūmnaḥ ādyo'vatāraḥ iti ||11||
GR14brhms5cu:649: nārāyaṇaḥ sa bhagavān āpas tasmāt sanātanāt |
GR14brhms5cu:651: yoga-nidrāṃ gatas tasmin sahasrāṃśaḥ svayaṃ mahān ||12|| // BrS_5.16 //
GR14brhms5cu:653: ayam eva kāraṇārṇavaśāyīty āha nārāyaṇa iti sārdhena | tāḥ āpa eva
GR14brhms5cu:654: kāraṇārṇo-nidhir āvirāsīt sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇātmakaḥ iti | pūrvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:657: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai nara-sūnavaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:658: tasya tā ayanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ||12||
GR14brhms5cu:661: haimāny aṇḍāni jātāni mahā-bhūtāvṛtāni tu ||13|| // BrS_5.17 //
GR14brhms5cu:663: tasmād eva brahmāṇḍānām utpattim āha tad rometi | tad iti tasyety arthaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:664: tasya saṅkarṣaṇātmakasya yad bījaṃ yoni-śaktāvadhyas taṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:665: bhūta-sūkṣma-paryantatāṃ prāptaṃ sat paścāt tasya loma-bila-jāleṣu vivareṣu
GR14brhms5cu:666: antarbhūtaṃ ca sat haimāni aṇḍāni jātāni tāni cāpañcī-kṛtāṃśaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:667: mahābhūtair jātānīty arthaḥ | tad uktaṃ daśame brahmaṇā -
GR14brhms5cu:674: lakṣyate 'ntar-gatāś cānye koṭiśo hy aṇḍa-rāśayaḥ || [BhP 3.11.39-40] iti ||13||
GR14brhms5cu:676: praty-aṇḍam evam ekāṃśād ekāṃśād viśati svayam | // BrS_5.18 //
GR14brhms5cu:679: tataś ca teṣu brahmāṇḍeṣu pṛthak pṛthak svarūpaiḥ svarūpāntaraiḥ sa eva
GR14brhms5cu:680: praviveśety āha pratyaṇḍam iti | ekāṃśād ekāṃśād ekenaikenāṃśenety
GR14brhms5cu:686: punaḥ kiṃ cakāra tatrāha - vāmāṅgād iti | viṣṇv-ādaya ime sarveṣām eva
GR14brhms5cu:687: brahmāṇḍānāṃ pālakādayaḥ prati brahmāṇḍāntaḥ sthitānāṃ viṣṇv-ādīnāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:688: svāṃśānāṃ prayoktāraḥ | yathā prati-brahmāṇḍe tathā adhi
GR14brhms5cu:689: brahmāṇḍa-maṇḍalam abhyupagantavyam iti bhāvaḥ | yeṣu prajāpatir ayaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:690: hiraṇyagarbha-rūpa eva na tu vakṣyamāṇa-caturmukha-rūpa eva, so'yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:692: tat-tat-pālana-saṃhāra-kartārau jñeyau | kūrca-deśāt bhruvor madhyāt | eṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:695: ahaṅkārātmakaṃ viśvaṃ tasmād etad vyajāyata ||16|| // BrS_5.20 //
GR14brhms5cu:697: tatra śambhoḥ kāryāntaram apy āha ahaṅkārātmakam ity ardhena | etad
GR14brhms5cu:702: atha tais tri-vidhair veśair līlām udvahataḥ kila |
GR14brhms5cu:703: yoga-nidrā bhagavatī tasya śrīr iva saṅgatā ||17|| // BrS_5.21 //
GR14brhms5cu:705: brahmāṇḍa-praviṣṭasya tu tat-tad-rūpasya līlām āha atha tair ity ādi | tais tat
GR14brhms5cu:706: sadṛśais trividhaiḥ prati-brahmāṇḍa-gata-viṣṇv-ādibhir veśai rūpair līlāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:708: brahmāṇḍāntargata-puruṣasyeti tām udvahati | tasminn ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:711: tatra yathā śrīr apy aṃśena saṅgatā tathā sāpīty arthaḥ ||17||
GR14brhms5cu:713: sisṛkṣāyāṃ tato nābhes tasya padmaṃ viniryayau |
GR14brhms5cu:714: tan-nālaṃ hema-nalinaṃ brahmaṇo lokam adbhutam ||18|| // BrS_5.22 //
GR14brhms5cu:716: tataś ca sisṛkṣāyām iti | nālaṃ nāla-yuktaṃ tad-dhema-nalinaṃ brahmaṇo
GR14brhms5cu:720: samavāyāprayogāc ca vibhinnāni pṛthak pṛthak || // BrS_5.23 //
GR14brhms5cu:722: yojayan māyayā devo yoga-nidrām akalpayat ||19|| // BrS_5.24 //
GR14brhms5cu:724: tathā asaṅkhya-jīvātmakasya samaṣṭi-jīvasya prabodhaṃ vaktuṃ punaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:726: vivṛtyāha - tattvānīti trayeṇa | tatra dvayam āha - māyayā sva-śaktyā
GR14brhms5cu:727: parasparaṃ tattvāni yojayann iti yojanānantaram eva nirīhatayā yoga-nidrām
GR14brhms5cu:730: yojayitvā tu tāny eva praviveśa svayaṃ guhām |
GR14brhms5cu:731: guhāṃ praviṣṭe tasmiṃs tu jīvātmā pratibudhyate ||20|| // BrS_5.25 //
GR14brhms5cu:733: atha tṛtīyam āha yojayitveti | yojayitvā tad yojanā-yoga-nidrayor antarāle ity
GR14brhms5cu:734: arthaḥ | guhāḥ virāḍ-vigraham | pratibudhyate pralaya-svāpāj jāgarti || 20 ||
GR14brhms5cu:736: sa nityo nitya-sambandhaḥ prakṛtiś ca paraiva sā ||21|| // BrS_5.26 //
GR14brhms5cu:738: jīvasya svābhāvikī sthitim āha sa nity ity ardheneti |
GR14brhms5cu:742: rañjitaṃ guṇa-rāgeṇa sa jīva iti kathyate || iti nārada-pañcarātrāt |
GR14brhms5cu:743: mamaivāṃśo jīva-loke jīva-bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ || iti śrī-gītopaniṣadbhyaś ca |
GR14brhms5cu:744: ataiva prakṛtiḥ sākṣi-rūpeṇa svarūpa-sthita eva | sva-pratibimba-rūpeṇa
GR14brhms5cu:745: pramātṛ-rūpeṇa prakṛtim iva prāptaś cety arthaḥ | prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām
GR14brhms5cu:746: jīva-bhūtām iti śrī-gītāsv eva | dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā iti śrutiś ca
GR14brhms5cu:749: evaṃ sarvātma-sambandhaṃ nābhyāṃ padmaṃ harer abhūt |
GR14brhms5cu:750: tatra brahmābhavad bhūyaś catur-vedi catur-mukhaḥ ||22|| // BrS_5.27 //
GR14brhms5cu:752: atha tasya samaṣṭi-jīvāsthānaṃ guhā-praviṣṭāt puruṣād udbhūtam ity āha
GR14brhms5cu:753: evam iti | tataḥ samaṣṭi-dehābhimāninas tasya hiraṇya-garbha-brahmaṇas
GR14brhms5cu:756: sa jāto bhagavac-chaktyā tat-kālaṃ kila coditaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:758: dadarśa kevalaṃ dhvāntaṃ nānyat kim api sarvataḥ ||23|| // BrS_5.28 //
GR14brhms5cu:760: atha tasya caturmukhasya ceṣṭām āha sa jāta ity sārdhena | spaṣṭam || 23 ||
GR14brhms5cu:762: uvāca puratas tasmai tasya divya sarasvatī |
GR14brhms5cu:763: kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāya govinda he gopī-jana ity api |
GR14brhms5cu:764: vallabhāya priyā vahner mantram te dāsyati priyam ||24|| // BrS_5.29 //
GR14brhms5cu:769: tapas tvaṃ tapa etena tava siddhir bhaviṣyati ||25|| // BrS_5.30 //
GR14brhms5cu:771: etad eva sparśeṣu yat ṣoḍaśam ekaviṃśam iti tṛtīya-skandhānusāreṇa yojayati
GR14brhms5cu:774: atha tepe sa suciraṃ prīṇan govindam avyayam |
GR14brhms5cu:775: śvetadvīpa-patiṃ kṛṣṇaṃ goloka-sthaṃ parāt param || // BrS_5.31 //
GR14brhms5cu:781: vilāsinī-gaṇa-vṛtaṃ svaiḥ svair aṃśair abhiṣṭutam ||26|| // BrS_5.34 //
GR14brhms5cu:783: sa tu tena mantreṇa sva-kāmanā-viśeṣānusārāt sṛṣṭikṛt-śakti-viśiṣṭatayā
GR14brhms5cu:785: upāsitavān ity āha -- atha tepe ity ādi caturbhiḥ | guṇa-rūpiṇyā
GR14brhms5cu:786: sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇa-mayyā rūpiṇyā mūrtimatyā paryupāsitaṃ paritas tad
GR14brhms5cu:787: gokulād bahiḥ-sthitayopāsitam dhyānādinā arcitam | māyā parety abhimukhe
GR14brhms5cu:788: ca vilajjamānā [BhP 2.7.47] iti | balim udvahanty ajayā nimiṣā iti ca
GR14brhms5cu:794: saṃskṛtaś cādi-gunuṇā dvijatām agamat tataḥ ||27|| // BrS_5.36 //
GR14brhms5cu:796: tad evaṃ dīkṣātaḥ parastād eva tasya dhruvasyeva dvijatva-saṃskāras
GR14brhms5cu:797: tad-ārādhitāt tan-mantrādhidevāj jātaḥ ity āha atha veṇv iti dvayena |
GR14brhms5cu:798: trayī-mūrtir gāyatrī veda-mātṛtvāt | dvitīya padye tasya eva vyaktibhāvitvāc
GR14brhms5cu:799: ca | tan-mayī gatiḥ paripāṭī | mukhābjāni praviveśety aṣṭa-karṇaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:805: tataś ca trayīm api tasmāt prāpya tam eva tuṣṭāvety āha trayyeti | keśān
GR14brhms5cu:807: aṃśavo ye prakāśante mam te keśa-saṃjñitāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:808: sarvajñāḥ keśavaṃ tasmān mām āhur muni-sattamāḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:814: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||29|| // BrS_5.38 //
GR14brhms5cu:816: stutim āha cintāmaṇīty ādibhiḥ | tatra goloke'smin mantra-bhedena
GR14brhms5cu:818: ca pīṭheṣu satsv api madhyasthatvena mukhyatayā prathamaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:822: sa-snehaṃ rakṣantam | kadācid rahasi tu vailakṣaṇyam ity āha lakṣmīti
GR14brhms5cu:828: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||30|| // BrS_5.39 //
GR14brhms5cu:830: tad evaṃ cintāmaṇi-prakara-sadma-mayīṃ kathā-gānaṃ nāṭyaṃ gamanam
GR14brhms5cu:833: dvitīya-pīṭha-gatāṃ līlām āha veṇum iti dvayena | veṇum iti tatra
GR14brhms5cu:839: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||31|| // BrS_5.40 //
GR14brhms5cu:841: ālolety ādi | praṇaya-pūrvako yaḥ keli-parihāsas tatra yā vaidagdhī saiva
GR14brhms5cu:842: vilāso yasya taṃ, drava-keli-parīhāsā ity amaraḥ ||31||
GR14brhms5cu:847: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||32|| // BrS_5.41 //

GR14brhms5cu:1163: iti darśayati sṛṣṭīti pañcabhiḥ | yathoktaṃ śrutibhiḥ | tvam akaraṇaḥ svarāḍ
GR14brhms5cu:1164: akhila-kāraka-śakti-dharas tava balim udvahanti samadantyajayā nimiṣā iti ||
GR14brhms5cu:1168: sañjāyate na hi tataḥ pṛthag asti hetoḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1169: yaḥ śambhutām api tathā samupaiti kāryād
GR14brhms5cu:1170: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||45|| // BrS_5.54 //
GR14brhms5cu:1172: atha krama-prāptaṃ maheśaṃ nirūpayati kṣīram iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1175: sthitatvāt | śrutiś ca eko nārāyaṇa evāgra āsīt, na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ,
GR14brhms5cu:1176: sa munir bhūtvā samacintayat | tata evaite vyajāyanta viśvo hiraṇyagarbho'gnir
GR14brhms5cu:1177: varuṇa-rudrendrāḥ iti tathā sa brahmaṇā sṛjati rudreṇa nāśayati |
GR14brhms5cu:1178: so'nutpatti-laya eva hariḥ | kāraṇa-rūpaḥ paraḥ paramānandaḥ | iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1179: śambhor api kāryatvaṃ guṇa-saṃvalanāt | yathoktaṃ śrī-daśame -
GR14brhms5cu:1180: harir hi nirguṇaḥ sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1181: sa sarva-dṛg upadraṣṭā taṃ bhajan nirguṇo bhavet || [BhP 10.88.5] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1182: etad evoktaṃ - vikāra-viśeṣa-yogād iti | kutracid abhedoktir yā dṛśyate tām
GR14brhms5cu:1183: api samādadhāti tato hetoḥ pṛthaktvaṃ nāstīti | yathoktam ṛg-veda-śirasi -
GR14brhms5cu:1184: atha nityo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ | brahmā nārāyaṇaḥ | śivaś ca nārāyaṇaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1185: śakraś ca nārāyaṇaḥ | dvādaśādityāś ca nārāyaṇaḥ | vāsavo nārāyaṇaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1186: aśvinī nārāyaṇaḥ | sarve ṛṣayo nārāyaṇaḥ | kālaś ca nārāyaṇaḥ | diśaś ca
GR14brhms5cu:1187: nārāyaṇaḥ | adhaś ca nārāyaṇaḥ | ūrdhvaś ca nārāyaṇaḥ | antar bahiś ca
GR14brhms5cu:1188: nārāyaṇaḥ | nārāyaṇa evedaṃ sarvaṃ jātaṃ jagatyāṃ jagad ity ādi | dvitīye
GR14brhms5cu:1195: yas tādṛg eva hi ca viṣṇutayā vibhāti
GR14brhms5cu:1196: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||46|| // BrS_5.55 //
GR14brhms5cu:1199: guṇāvatāra-maheśa-prasaṅgād guṇāvatāraṃ viṣṇuṃ nirūpayati dīpārcir iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1201: kāraṇārṇava-śāyī tasya garbhodaka-śāyī, tasya cāvatāro'yaṃ viṣṇur iti
GR14brhms5cu:1204: tena saha sāmyam | tathā govindena viṣṇur gamyate | śambhos tu
GR14brhms5cu:1206: sāmyam iti bodhanāya tad ittham ucyate | mahā-viṣṇor api kalā-viśeṣatvena
GR14brhms5cu:1212: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||47|| // BrS_5.56 //
GR14brhms5cu:1214: atha kāraṇārṇava-śāyinaṃ nirūpayati | ananta-jagad-aṇḍaiḥ saha roma-kūpā
GR14brhms5cu:1215: yasya saḥ | saha-śabdasya pūrva-nipātābhāvaḥ, ārṣaḥ | ādhāra-śakti-mayīṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1220: viṣṇur mahān sa iha yasya kalā-viśeṣo
GR14brhms5cu:1221: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||48|| // BrS_5.57 //
GR14brhms5cu:1225: atra ca tam apy evaṃ tat-salakṣaṇatayā varṇayati | tat-taj-jagad-aṇḍa-nāthā
GR14brhms5cu:1226: viṣṇv-ādayaḥ jīvanti tat-tad-adhikāritayā jagati prakaṭaṃ tiṣṭhanti ||48||
GR14brhms5cu:1229: svīyam kiyat prakaṭayaty api tadvad atra |
GR14brhms5cu:1231: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||49|| // BrS_5.58 //
GR14brhms5cu:1233: tad evaṃ devy-ādīnāṃ tad-āśrayakatvaṃ darśayitvā prasaṅga-saṅgatyā
GR14brhms5cu:1234: brahmaṇaś ca darśayan atīva-bhinnatayā jīvatvam eva spaṣṭayati bhāsvān
GR14brhms5cu:1235: iti | bhāsvān sūryo, yathā nijeṣu nitya-svīyatvena vikhyāteṣu aśma-sakaleṣu
GR14brhms5cu:1236: sūrya-kāntākhyeṣu svīyaṃ kiñcit tejaḥ prakaṭayati | api-śabdāt tena
GR14brhms5cu:1237: tad-upādhikāṃśena dāhādi-kāryaṃ svayam eva karoti | tathā ya eva
GR14brhms5cu:1238: jīva-viśeṣa-kiñcit-tejaḥ prakaṭayati | tena tad-upādhikāṃśena svayam eva
GR14brhms5cu:1239: brahmā san jagad-aṇḍe brahmāṇḍe vidhāna-kartā vyaṣṭi-sṛṣṭi-kartā
GR14brhms5cu:1240: bhavatīty arthaḥ | yad vā mahā-brahmaivāyaṃ varṇyate | tad-upalakṣito
GR14brhms5cu:1241: mahā-śivaś ca jñeyaḥ | tataś ca jagad-aṇḍānāṃ vidhāna-kartṛtvaṃ ca yuktam
GR14brhms5cu:1242: eva | yadyapi durgākhyā māyā kāraṇārṇava-śāyina eva karmakarī | yadyapi
GR14brhms5cu:1243: ca brahma-viṣṇv-ādyā garbhodaka-śāyina evāvatārās tathāpi tasya
GR14brhms5cu:1244: sarvāśrayatayā te'pi tad-āśritatayā gaṇitāḥ | evam uttaratrāpi ||49||
GR14brhms5cu:1249: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||50|| // BrS_5.59 //
GR14brhms5cu:1251: atha sarve sarva-vighna-nivāraṇārthaṃ prathamaṃ gaṇapatiṃ stuvantīti tasyaiva
GR14brhms5cu:1252: stuti-yogyatety āśaṅkayā pratyācaṣṭe yat-pādeti | kaimutyena tad evaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1256: agnir mahi gaganam ambu marud diśaś ca
GR14brhms5cu:1258: yasmād bhavanti vibhavanti viśanti yaṃ ca
GR14brhms5cu:1259: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||51|| // BrS_5.60 //
GR14brhms5cu:1261: tac ca yuktam ity āha agnir mahīti | sarvaṃ spaṣṭam ||51||
GR14brhms5cu:1266: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||52|| // BrS_5.61 //
GR14brhms5cu:1268: kecit sa-vitāraṃ sarveśvaraṃ vadanti yathāha yac-cakṣur iti ya eva cakṣuḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1271: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam || iti gītābhyaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1272: bhīṣāsmād vātaḥ pavate bhīṣodeti sūryaḥ || ity ādi śruteḥ | virāḍ-rūpasyaiva
GR14brhms5cu:1278: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||53|| // BrS_5.62 //
GR14brhms5cu:1280: kiṃ bahunā, dharma iti | ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate
GR14brhms5cu:1283: yas tv indragopam athavendram aho sva-karma-
GR14brhms5cu:1286: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||54|| // BrS_5.63 //
GR14brhms5cu:1288: ataiva sarveśvaras tu parjanyavad draṣṭavyaḥ iti nyāyena
GR14brhms5cu:1289: karmānurūpa-phala-dātṛtvena sāmye'pi bhakte tu pakṣapāta-viśeṣaṃ karotīty
GR14brhms5cu:1291: samo'haṃ sarva-bhūteṣu na me dveṣo'sti na priyaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1292: ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham || [Gītā 9.29] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1293: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate |
GR14brhms5cu:1294: teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy aham || [Gītā 9.22] iti ca
GR14brhms5cu:1299: sañcintya tasya sadṛśīṃ tanum āpur ete
GR14brhms5cu:1300: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||55|| // BrS_5.64 //
GR14brhms5cu:1302: ya eva ca vairbhyo'py anya-durlabha-phalaṃ dadāti kim uta
GR14brhms5cu:1303: sva-viṣayaka-kāmādinā niṣkāma-śreṣṭhebhyaḥ | tataḥ ko vānyo bhajanīya
GR14brhms5cu:1304: iti bhajāmīty anta-prakaraṇam upasaṃharati yaṃ krodheti | sahaja-praṇayaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1307: svasmin pitṛtvādi-bhāvanāmayam | sevyo'yaṃ memeti bhāvanā dāsyam ity
GR14brhms5cu:1308: arthaḥ | tasya sadṛśīṃ krodhāveśino'prākṛta-mātrāṃśena, tu tat tad bhāvanā
GR14brhms5cu:1311: jagad-vyāpāra-varjam [Vs. 4.4.17] iti brahma-sūtrasya, prayojyamāne mayi tāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1312: śuddhāṃ bhāgavatīṃ tanum iti śrī-nārada-vākyasya ca dṛṣṭyā sarvathā
GR14brhms5cu:1313: tat-sadṛśatve virodhāt | vaireṇa yaṃ nṛpatayaḥ ity ādau anurakta-dhiyām
GR14brhms5cu:1314: punaḥ kim ity anurakta-dhīṣu suṣṭhv iti | anena
GR14brhms5cu:1315: goloka-stha-prapañcāvatīrṇayor ekatvam eva darśitam | tad uktaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:1316: nandādayas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā ity ādi || 55 ||
GR14brhms5cu:1320: kathā gānaṃ nāṭyaṃ gamanam api vaṃśī priya-sakhi
GR14brhms5cu:1321: cid-ānandaṃ jyotiḥ param api tad āsvādyam api ca || // BrS_5.65 //
GR14brhms5cu:1322: sa yatra kṣīrābdhiḥ sravati surabhībhyaś ca su-mahān
GR14brhms5cu:1323: nimeṣārdhākhyo vā vrajati na hi yatrāpi samayaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1324: bhaje śvetadvīpaṃ tam aham iha golokam iti yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1325: vidantas te santaḥ kṣiti-virala-cārāḥ katipaye ||56|| // BrS_5.66 //
GR14brhms5cu:1327: tad evaṃ nijeṣṭa-devaṃ bhajanīyatvena stutvā tena viśiṣṭaṃ tal lokaṃ tathā
GR14brhms5cu:1328: stauti śriyaḥ kāntā iti yugmakena | śriyaḥ śrī-vraja-sundarī rūpās tāsām eva
GR14brhms5cu:1329: mantre dhyāne ca sarvatra prasiddheḥ | tāsām anantānām apy eka eva kāntaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1330: iti parama-nārāyaṇādibhyo'pi tasya tat-tal-lokebhyo'pi tadīya-lokasya cāsya
GR14brhms5cu:1331: māhātmyaṃ darśitam | kalpa-taravo drumāḥ iti teṣāṃ sarveṣām eva
GR14brhms5cu:1333: bhūmir ity ādikaṃ ca tadvad bhūmir api sarva-spṛhāṃ dadāti kim uta
GR14brhms5cu:1334: kaustubhādi | toyam apy amṛtam iva svādu kim utāmṛtam ity ādi | vaṃśī
GR14brhms5cu:1338: ca nitya-pūrṇa-candratvāt tathā tad eva param api tat tat prakāśyam apīty
GR14brhms5cu:1340: tathā tad eva teṣām āsvādyaṃ bhogyam api ca cic-chaktimayatvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1341: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param [BhP 10.28.14] iti
GR14brhms5cu:1345: gandha-rūpaṃ svādu-rūpaṃ dravyaṃ puṣpādikaṃ ca yat |
GR14brhms5cu:1346: heyāṃśānām abhāvāc ca rasa-rūpaṃ bhavec ca tat ||
GR14brhms5cu:1347: tvag-bījaṃ caiva heyāṃśaṃ kaṭhināṃśaṃ ca yad bhavet |
GR14brhms5cu:1348: sarvaṃ tad bhautikaṃ viddhi nahi bhūtamayaṃ hi tat |
GR14brhms5cu:1349: rasavad bhautikaṃ dravyam atra syād rasa-rūpakam || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1350: surabhībhyaś ca saratīti tvadīya-vaṃśī-dhvany-ādy-āveśād iti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1351: vrajati nahīti tad-āveśena te tad-vāsinaḥ kālam api na jānantīti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1352: kāla-doṣās tatra na santīti vā | na ca kālaḥ vikramaḥ [BhP 2.9.10] iti dvitīyāt |
GR14brhms5cu:1353: ataiva śvetaṃ śuddhaṃ dvīpaṃ anyāsaṅga-rahitam | yathā -- sarasi padmaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1354: tiṣṭhati tathā-bhūmyāṃ hi tiṣṭhati [GTU 2.27] iti tāpanībhyaḥ | kṣitīti | tad
GR14brhms5cu:1355: uktaṃ yaṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto'pi pitāmaham [HV 62.29] iti || 56 ||
GR14brhms5cu:1358: brahman mahattva-vijñāne prajā-sarge ca cen matiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1359: pañca-ślokīm imāṃ vidyāṃ vatsa dattāṃ nibodha me ||57|| // BrS_5.67 //
GR14brhms5cu:1361: tad evaṃ tasya stutim uktvā śrī-bhagavat-prasāda-lābham āha atheti | sarvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1367: tatra prasāda-rūpāṃ pañca-ślokīm āha prabuddha iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1372: bodhayan ātmanātmānaṃ bhaktim apy uttamāṃ labhet ||59|| // BrS_5.69 //
GR14brhms5cu:1375: pramāṇair iti | pramāṇair bhagavac-chāstrais tat-sadācārais tadīyā ye santas
GR14brhms5cu:1376: teṣām ācārair anusṭānais tad-abhyāsais teṣām eva paunaḥpuṇyena bāhulyena
GR14brhms5cu:1377: ātmanā ātmānaṃ bodhayati svayam eva svaṃ bhagavad-āśritaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1378: śuddha-jīva-rūpam anubhavati, tato'py uttamāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktiṃ labhata iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1383: bhavata upāsate 'ṅghrim abhavaṃ bhuvi viśvasitāḥ || [BhP 10.87.20] iti || 59 ||
GR14brhms5cu:1385: yasyāḥ śreyas-karaṃ nāsti yayā nirvṛtim āpnuyāt |
GR14brhms5cu:1386: yā sādhayati mām eva bhaktiṃ tām eva sādhayet ||60|| // BrS_5.70 //
GR14brhms5cu:1387: dharmān anyān parityajya mām ekaṃ bhaja viśvasan |
GR14brhms5cu:1388: yādṛśī yādṛśī śraddhā siddhir bhavati tādṛśī || // BrS_5.71 //
GR14brhms5cu:1390: tenaiva karmaṇā dhyāyan māṃ parāṃ bhaktim icchati ||61|| // BrS_5.72 //
GR14brhms5cu:1392: punaḥ śuddhām eva sādhana-bhaktiṃ draḍhayann akāmair api tām eva
GR14brhms5cu:1393: kuryād ity āha - dharmān anyān iti | tad uktaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:1395: tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena yajeta puruṣaṃ param || [BhP 2.3.10] iti || 61 ||
GR14brhms5cu:1400: vidhe vidhehi tvam atho jaganti ||62|| // BrS_5.73 //
GR14brhms5cu:1402: tasmāt tava sisṛkṣāpi phaliṣyatīti sa-yuktikam āha - ahaṃ hīti | pradhānaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1403: śreṣṭhaṃ bījaṃ, pūrṇa-bhagavad-rūpaṃ prakṛtir avyaktaṃ, pumān tad-draṣṭā,
GR14brhms5cu:1404: kiṃ bahunā tavam api mayā āhitaṃ arpitaṃ teja idaṃ bibharṣi, tasmāt tena
GR14brhms5cu:1405: mat-tejasā jaganti sarvāṇi sthāvara-jaṅgamāni he vidhe hi kurv iti ||62||
